title: hack3rcon
author: hack3rcon
content: Hello,If someone has made a loss in buying and selling Ethereum, what is your suggestion? Should he\she hold Ethereum?Is it possible for the price to reach $2300 before Christmas?Thanks.

comments.author: MIner1448
comments.body: Quote from: hack3rcon on December 07, 2023, 06:11:38 AMHello,If someone has made a loss in buying and selling Ethereum, what is your suggestion? Should he\she hold Ethereum?Is it possible for the price to reach $2300 before Christmas?Thanks.This issue needs to be approached comprehensively; of course, it is still necessary to understand what kind of losses, if not high losses, then it is better to freeze the transaction and transfer it to stemcoins if you have not analyzed the project enough or in this case ether, but if there are large losses and even more so if it is ether or cue ball, then you can wait for your growth, maybe even a year or two.

Should he\she hold Ethereum?Is it possible for the price to reach $2300 before Christmas?Thanks.If you are in profit, sell 50% of it. Christmas to Chinese new year  is considered to be slow days for crypto trading. The market remains sideways or falls at this time.As Ethereum has gained a good percentage and it could go through a correction. The price rise comes in waves and we might get chance to buy it back cheaper at later time.Selling 50% and keeping the rest would save you from FOMO as well as loss. No one can guarantee the market movement, so its upto us to play safe.

comments.body: No one can predict absolutely exactly what will happen to the price of Ethereum, but there are prerequisites for growth. I think investing in Ethereum would be the best option, since this asset has shown its reliability and stability in the cryptocurrency market.

Maybe I just don't feel or want to hold it, but if I look at the fee as expected by most people, it's actually very expensive.  But let me try to guess what its price value will be before the end of this month of December. I think it will play for $2300–$2700 each. When that happens, it will be lucky for those who have holdings.
